fields.name: Ion Cannon Turret
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack:{/STRONG} Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).{BR}If this attack hits the target ship, the ship suffers 1 damage and receives 1 ion token.  Then cancel all dice results.

fields.name: Proton Torpedoes
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack (target lock):{/STRONG} Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.{BR}You may change 1 of your {FOCUS} results to a {CRIT} result.

fields.name: R2 Astromech
fields.text: You may treat all 1- and 2-speed maneuvers as green maneuvers.

fields.name: R2-F2
fields.text: {STRONG}Action:{/STRONG} Increase your agility value by 1 until the end of this game round.

fields.name: R2-D2
fields.text: After executing a green maneuver, you may recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

fields.name: R5-D8
fields.text: {STRONG}Action:{/STRONG} Roll 1 defense die.{BR}On a {EVADE} or {FOCUS} result, discard 1 of your facedown Damage cards.

fields.name: R5-K6
fields.text: After spending your target lock, roll 1 defense die.{BR}On a {EVADE} result, immediately acquire a target lock on that same ship.  You cannot spend this target lock during this attack.

fields.name: R5 Astromech
fields.text: During the End phase, you may choose 1 of your faceup Damage cards with the Ship trait and flip it facedown.

fields.name: Determination
fields.text: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card with the Pilot trait, discard it immediately without resolving its effect.

fields.name: Swarm Tactics
fields.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1.{BR}Until the end of this phase, treat the chosen ship as if its pilot skill were equal to your pilot skill.

fields.name: Squad Leader
fields.text: {STRONG}Action:{/STRONG} Choose 1 ship at Range 1-2 that has a lower pilot skill than you.{BR}The chosen ship may immediately perform 1 free action.

fields.name: Expert Handling
fields.text: {STRONG}Action:{/STRONG} Perform a free barrel roll action.  If you do not have the {BARRELROLL} action icon, receive 1 stress token.{BR}You may then remove 1 enemy target lock from your ship.

fields.name: Marksmanship
fields.text: {STRONG}Action:{/STRONG} When attacking this round, you may change 1 of your {FOCUS} results to a {CRIT} result and all of your other {FOCUS} results to {HIT} results.

fields.name: Cluster Missiles
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack (target lock):{/STRONG} Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack twice.

fields.name: Concussion Missiles
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack (target lock):{/STRONG}  Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.{BR}You may change 1 of your blank results to a {HIT} result.

fields.name: Daredevil
fields.text: {STRONG}Action:{/STRONG} Execute a white ({TURNLEFT} 1) or ({TURNRIGHT} 1) maneuver.  Then, receive 1 stress token.{BR}Then, if you do not have the {BOOST} action icon, roll 2 attack dice.  Suffer any damage ({HIT}) and any critical damage ({CRIT}) rolled.

fields.name: Elusiveness
fields.text: When defending, you may receive 1 stress token to choose 1 attack die.  The attacker must reroll that die.{BR}If you have at least 1 stress token, you cannot use this ability.

fields.name: Homing Missiles
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack (target lock):{/STRONG} Discard this card to perform this attack.{BR}The defender cannot spend evade tokens during this attack.

fields.name: Push the Limit
fields.text: Once per round, after you perform an action, you may perform 1 free action shown in your action bar.{BR}Then receive 1 stress token.

fields.name: Deadeye
fields.text: You may treat the {STRONG}Attack (target lock):{/STRONG} header as {STRONG}Attack (focus):{/STRONG}.{BR}When an attack instructs you to spend a target lock, you may spend a focus token instead.

fields.name: Expose
fields.text: {STRONG}Action:{/STRONG} Until the end of the round, increase your primary weapon value by 1 and decrease your agility value by 1.

fields.name: Gunner
fields.text: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack.  You cannot perform another attack this round.

fields.name: Ion Cannon
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack:{/STRONG} Attack 1 ship.{BR}If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and receives 1 ion token.  Then cancel all dice results.

fields.name: Mercenary Copilot
fields.text: When attacking at Range 3, you may change 1 of your {HIT} results to a {CRIT} result.

fields.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack:{/STRONG} Attack 1 ship.{BR}Immediately after rolling your attack dice, you must change all of your {CRIT} results to {HIT} results.

fields.name: Assault Missiles
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack (target lock):{/STRONG} Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.{BR}If this attack hits, each other ship at Range 1 of the defender suffers 1 damage.

fields.name: Seismic Charges
fields.text: When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 seismic charge token.{BR}This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase.{BR}{STRONG}Seismic Charge Token:{/STRONG} When this bomb token detonates, each ship at Range 1 of the token suffers 1 damage.  Then discard this token.

fields.name: Proximity Mines
fields.text: {STRONG}Action:{/STRONG} Discard this card to {STRONG}drop{/STRONG} 1 proximity mine token.{BR}When a ship's base or maneuver template overlaps this token, this token {STRONG}detonates{/STRONG}.{BR}{STRONG}Proximity Mine Token:{/STRONG} When this bomb token detonates, the ship that moved through or overlapped this token rolls 3 attack dice and suffers all damage ({HIT}) and critical damage ({CRIT}) rolled.  Then discard this token.

fields.name: Veteran Instincts
fields.text: Increase your pilot skill value by 2.

fields.name: Weapons Engineer
fields.text: You may maintain 2 target locks (only 1 per enemy ship).{BR}When you acquire a target lock, you may lock onto 2 different ships.

fields.name: Draw Their Fire
fields.text: When a friendly ship at Range 1 is hit by an attack, you may suffer 1 of the uncanceled {CRIT} results instead of the target ship.

fields.name: Nien Nunb
fields.text: You may treat all {STRAIGHT} maneuvers as green maneuvers.

fields.name: Luke Skywalker
fields.text: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack.  You may change 1 {FOCUS} result to a {HIT} result.  You cannot perform another attack this round.

fields.name: Advanced Proton Torpedoes
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack (target lock):{/STRONG} Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.{BR}You may change up to 3 of your blank results to {FOCUS} results.

fields.name: Chewbacca
fields.text: When you are dealt a Damage card, you may immediately discard that card and recover 1 shield.{BR}Then, discard this Upgrade card.

fields.name: Autoblaster
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack:{/STRONG} Attack 1 ship.{BR}Your {HIT} results cannot be canceled by defense dice.{BR}The defender may cancel {CRIT} results before {HIT} results.

fields.name: Fire-Control System
fields.text: After you perform an attack, you may acquire a target lock on the defender.

fields.name: Blaster Turret
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack (focus):{/STRONG} Spend 1 focus token to perform this attack against 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).

fields.name: Recon Specialist
fields.text: When you perform a focus action, assign 1 additional focus token to your ship.

fields.name: Intelligence Agent
fields.text: At the start of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2.  You may look at that ship's chosen maneuver.

fields.name: Saboteur
fields.text: {STRONG}Action:{/STRONG} Choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1 and roll 1 attack die.  On a {HIT} or {CRIT} result, choose 1 random facedown Damage card assigned to that ship, flip it faceup, and resolve it.

fields.name: Proton Bombs
fields.text: When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to {STRONG}drop{/STRONG} 1 proton bomb token.{BR}This token {STRONG}detonates{/STRONG} at the end of the Activation phase.{BR}{STRONG}Proton Bomb Token:{/STRONG} When this bomb token detonates, deal 1 {STRONG}faceup{/STRONG} Damage card to each ship at Range 1 of the token.  Then discard this token.

fields.name: Adrenaline Rush
fields.text: When you reveal a red maneuver, you may discard this card to treat that maneuver as a white maneuver until the end of the Activation phase.

fields.name: Advanced Sensors
fields.text: Immediately before you reveal your maneuver, you may perform 1 free action.{BR}If you use this ability, you must skip your "Perform Action" step during this round.

fields.name: Sensor Jammer
fields.text: When defending, you may change 1 of the attacker's {HIT} results into a {FOCUS} result.{BR}The attacker cannot reroll the die with the changed result.

fields.name: Flight Instructor
fields.text: When defending, you may reroll 1 of your {FOCUS} results.  If the attacker's pilot skill value is "2" or lower, you may reroll 1 of your blank results instead.

fields.name: Rebel Captive
fields.text: Once per round, the first ship that declares you as the target of an attack immediately receives 1 stress token.

fields.name: Darth Vader
fields.text: After you perform an attack against an enemy ship, you may suffer 2 damage to cause that ship to suffer 1 critical damage.

fields.name: Ion Pulse Missiles
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack (target lock):{/STRONG} Discard this card to perform this attack.{BR}If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and receives 2 ion tokens.  Then cancel {STRONG}all{/STRONG} dice results.

fields.name: Navigator
fields.text: When you reveal a maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver with the same bearing.{BR}You cannot rotate to a red maneuver if you have any stress tokens.

fields.name: Opportunist
fields.text: When attacking, if the defender does not have any focus or evade tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to roll 1 additional attack die.{BR}You cannot use this ability if you have any stress tokens.

fields.name: Wingman
fields.text: At the start of the Combat phase, remove 1 stress token from another friendly ship at Range 1.

fields.name: Decoy
fields.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1-2.  Exchange your pilot skill with that ship's pilot skill until the end of the phase.

fields.name: Outmaneuver
fields.text: When attacking a ship inside your firing arc, if you are not inside that ship's firing arc, reduce its agility value by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

fields.name: R7 Astromech
fields.text: Once per round when defending, if you have a target lock on the attacker, you may spend the target lock to choose any or all attack dice.  The attacker must reroll the chosen dice.

fields.name: Flechette Torpedoes
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack (target lock):{/STRONG} Discard this card and spend your target lock to perform this attack.{BR}After you perform this attack, the defender receives 1 stress token if its hull value is "4" or lower.

fields.name: Predator
fields.text: When attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die.  If the defender's pilot skill value is "2" or lower, you may instead reroll up to 2 attack dice.

fields.name: R2-D2
fields.text: At the end of the End phase, if you have no shields, you may recover 1 shield and roll 1 attack die.  On a {HIT} result, randomly flip 1 of your facedown Damage cards faceup and resolve it.

fields.name: R7-T1
fields.text: {STRONG}Action:{/STRONG} Choose an enemy ship at Range 1-2.  If you are inside that ship's firing arc, you may acquire a target lock on that ship.  Then, you may perform a free boost action.

fields.name: Tactician
fields.text: After you perform an attack against a ship inside your firing arc at Range 2, that ship receives 1 stress token.

fields.name: R3-A2
fields.text: When you declare the target of your attack, if the defender is inside your firing arc, you may receive 1 stress token to cause the defender to receive 1 stress token.

fields.name: C-3PO
fields.text: Once per round, before you roll 1 or more defense dice, you may guess aloud a number of {EVADE} results.  If you roll that many {EVADE} results (before modifying dice), add 1 {EVADE} result.

fields.name: R2-D6
fields.text: Your upgrade bar gains the {ELITE} upgrade icon.{BR}You cannot equip this upgrade if you already have a {ELITE} upgrade icon or if your pilot skill value is "2" or lower.

fields.name: Chardaan Refit
fields.text: This card has a negative squad point cost.

fields.name: Proton Rockets
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack (Focus):{/STRONG} Discard this card to perform this attack.{BR}You may roll additional attack dice equal to your agility value, to a maximum of 3 additional dice.

fields.name: Enhanced Scopes
fields.text: During the Activation phase, treat your pilot skill value as "0".

fields.name: Kyle Katarn
fields.text: After you remove a stress token from your ship, you may assign a focus token to your ship.

fields.name: Jan Ors
fields.text: Once per round, when a friendly ship at Range 1-3 performs a focus action or would be assigned a focus token, you may assign it an evade token instead.

fields.name: R4-D6
fields.text: When you are hit by an attack and there are at least 3 uncanceled {HIT} results, you may choose to cancel those results until there are 2 remaining.  For each result canceled this way, receive 1 stress token.

fields.name: Leia Organa
fields.text: At the start of the Activation phase, you may discard this card to allow all friendly ships that reveal a red maneuver to treat that maneuver as a white maneuver until the end of the phase.

fields.name: R5-P9
fields.text: At the end of the Combat phase, you may spend 1 of your focus tokens to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

fields.name: Han Solo
fields.text: When attacking, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may spend that target lock to change all of your {FOCUS} results to {HIT} results.

fields.name: Lando Calrissian
fields.text: {STRONG}Action:{/STRONG} Roll 2 defense dice.  For each {FOCUS} result, assign 1 focus token to your ship.  For each {EVADE} result, assign 1 evade token to your ship.

fields.name: Targeting Coordinator
fields.text: {STRONG}Energy:{/STRONG} You may spend 1 energy to choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1-2.  Acquire a target lock, then assign the blue target lock token to the chosen ship.

fields.name: Mara Jade
fields.text: At the end of the Combat phase, each enemy ship at Range 1 that does not have a stress token receives 1 stress token.

fields.name: Stay On Target
fields.text: When you reveal a maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver with the same speed.{BR}Treat that maneuver as a red maneuver.

fields.name: Dash Rendar
fields.text: You may perform attacks while overlapping an obstacle.{BR}Your attacks cannot be obstructed.

fields.name: Fleet Officer
fields.text: {STRONG}Action:{/STRONG} Choose up to 2 friendly ships at Range 1-2 and assign 1 focus token to each of those ships.  Then receive 1 stress token.

fields.name: Lone Wolf
fields.text: When attacking or defending, if there are no other friendly ships at Range 1-2, you may reroll 1 of your blank results.

fields.name: Ruthlessness
fields.text: After you perform an attack that hits, you {STRONG}must{/STRONG} choose 1 other ship at Range 1 of the defender (other than yourself).  That ship suffers 1 damage.

fields.name: "Leebo"
fields.text: {STRONG}Action:{/STRONG} Perform a free boost action.  Then receive 1 ion token.

fields.name: Intimidation
fields.text: While you are touching an enemy ship, reduce that ship's agility value by 1.

fields.name: Ysanne Isard
fields.text: At the start of the Combat phase, if you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to your ship, you may perform a free evade action.

fields.name: Moff Jerjerrod
fields.text: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard this Upgrade card or another {CREW} Upgrade card to flip that Damage card facedown (without resolving its effect).

fields.name: Ion Torpedoes
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack (target lock):{/STRONG} Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.{BR}If this attack hits, the defender and each ship at Range 1 of it receives 1 ion token.

fields.name: Bodyguard
fields.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may spend a focus token to choose a friendly ship at Range 1 with higher pilot skill than you. Increase its agility value by 1 until the end of the round.

fields.name: Calculation
fields.text: When attacking, you may spend a focus token to change 1 of your {FOCUS} results to a {CRIT} result.

fields.name: Flechette Cannon
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack:{/STRONG} Attack 1 ship.{BR}If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and, if the defender is not stressed, it also receives 1 stress token.  Then cancel {STRONG}all{/STRONG} dice results.

fields.name: Inertial Dampeners
fields.text: When you reveal your maneuver, you may discard this card to instead perform a white [0{STOP}] maneuver. Then receive 1 stress token.

fields.name: Accuracy Corrector
fields.text: When attacking, during the "Modify Attack Dice" step, you may cancel all of your dice results. Then, you may add 2 {HIT} results to your roll.{BR}Your dice cannot be modified again during this attack.

fields.name: "Mangler" Cannon
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack:{/STRONG} Attack 1 ship.{BR}When attacking, you may change 1 of your {HIT} results to a {CRIT} result.

fields.name: Dead Man's Switch
fields.text: When you are destroyed, each ship at Range 1 suffers 1 damage.

fields.name: Salvaged Astromech
fields.text: When you are dealt a Damage card with the {STRONG}Ship{/STRONG} trait, you may immediately discard that card (before resolving its effect).{BR}Then, discard this Upgrade card.

fields.name: "Hot Shot" Blaster
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack:{/STRONG} Discard this card to attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).

fields.name: Feedback Array
fields.text: During the Combat phase, instead of performing any attacks, you may receive 1 ion token and suffer 1 damage to choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1.  That ship suffers 1 damage.

fields.name: "Genius"
fields.text: If you are equipped with a bomb that can be dropped when you reveal your maneuver, you may drop the bomb {STRONG}after{/STRONG} you execute your maneuver instead.

fields.name: Greedo
fields.text: The first time you attack each round and the first time you defend each round, the first Damage card dealt is dealt faceup.

fields.name: Bomb Loadout
fields.text: Your upgrade bar gains the {BOMB} icon.

fields.name: Unhinged Astromech
fields.text: You may treat all 3-speed maneuvers as green maneuvers.

fields.name: R4-B11
fields.text: When attacking, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may spend the target lock to choose any or all defense dice. The defender must reroll the chosen dice.

fields.name: Autoblaster Turret
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack:{/STRONG} Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).{BR}Your {HIT} results cannot be canceled by defense dice. The defender may cancel {CRIT} results before {HIT} results.

fields.name: R4 Agromech
fields.text: When attacking, after you spend a focus token, you may acquire a target lock on the defender.

fields.name: Outlaw Tech
fields.text: After you execute a red maneuver, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

fields.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
fields.text: When attacking with your primary weapon, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may add 1 {CRIT} result to your roll.  If you do, you cannot spend target locks during this attack.

fields.name: K4 Security Droid
fields.text: After executing a green maneuver, you may acquire a target lock.

fields.name: Cluster Mines
fields.text: {STRONG}Action:{/STRONG} Discard this card to {STRONG}drop{/STRONG} 3 cluster mine tokens.{BR}{BR}When a ship's base or maneuver template overlaps a cluster mine token, that token {STRONG}detonates{/STRONG}.{BR}{BR}{STRONG}Cluster Mines Tokens:{/STRONG} When one of these bomb tokens detonates, the ship that moved through or overlapped this token rolls 2 attack dice and suffers all damage ({HIT}) rolled.  Then discard this token.

fields.name: Extra Munitions
fields.text: When you equip this card, place 1 ordnance token on each equipped {TORPEDO}, {MISSILE}, and {BOMB} Upgrade card.  When you are instructed to discard an Upgrade card, you may discard 1 ordnance token on that card instead.

fields.name: Glitterstim
fields.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may discard this card and receive 1 stress token.  If you do, until the end of the round, when attacking  or defending, you may change all of your {FOCUS} results to {HIT} or {EVADE} results.

fields.name: Emperor Palpatine
fields.text: Once per round, you may change a friendly ship's die result to any other die result.  That die result cannot be modified again.

fields.name: Bossk
fields.text: After you perform an attack that does not hit, if you are not stressed, you {STRONG}must{/STRONG} receive 1 stress token. Then assign 1 focus token to your ship and acquire a target lock on the defender.

fields.name: Lightning Reflexes
fields.text: After you execute a white or green maneuver on your dial, you may discard this card to rotate your ship 180°.  Then receive 1 stress token {STRONG}after{/STRONG} the "Check Pilot Stress" step.

fields.name: Plasma Torpedoes
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack (target lock):{/STRONG} Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.{BR}{BR}If this attack hits, after dealing damage, remove 1 shield token from the defender.

fields.name: Ion Bombs
fields.text: When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to {STRONG}drop{/STRONG} 1 ion bomb token.{BR}{BR}This token {STRONG}detonates{/STRONG} at the end of the Activation phase.{BR}{BR}{STRONG}Ion Bombs Token:{/STRONG} When this bomb token detonates, each ship at Range 1 of the token receives 2 ion tokens.  Then discard this token.

fields.name: Twin Laser Turret
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack:{/STRONG} Perform this attack {STRONG}twice{/STRONG} (even against a ship outside your firing arc).{BR}{BR}Each time this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage.  Then cancel {STRONG}all{/STRONG} dice results.

fields.name: Conner Net
fields.text: {STRONG}Action:{/STRONG} Discard this card to {STRONG}drop{/STRONG} 1 Conner Net token.{BR}{BR}When a ship's base or maneuver template overlaps this token, this token {STRONG}detonates{/STRONG}.{BR}{BR}{STRONG}Conner Net Token:{/STRONG} When this bomb token detonates, the ship that moved through or overlapped this token suffers 1 damage, receives 2 ion tokens, and skips its "Perform Action" step.  Then discard this token.

fields.name: Bombardier
fields.text: When dropping a bomb, you may use the ({STRAIGHT} 2) template instead of the ({STRAIGHT} 1) template.

fields.name: Stealth Device
fields.text: Increase your agility value by 1.  If you are hit by an attack, discard this card.

fields.name: Anti-Pursuit Lasers
fields.text: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver that causes it to overlap your ship, roll 1 attack die.  On a {HIT} or {CRIT} result, the enemy ship suffers 1 damage.

fields.name: Shield Upgrade
fields.text: Increase your shield value by 1.

fields.name: Engine Upgrade
fields.text: Your action bar gains the {BOOST} action icon.

fields.name: Munitions Failsafe
fields.text: When attacking with a secondary weapon that instructs you to discard it to perform the attack, do not discard it unless the attack hits.

fields.name: Targeting Computer
fields.text: Your action bar gains the {TARGETLOCK} action icon.

fields.name: Hull Upgrade
fields.text: Increase your hull value by 1.

fields.name: Advanced Cloaking Device
fields.text: After you perform an attack, you may perform a free cloak action.

fields.name: B-Wing/E2
fields.text: Your upgrade bar gains the {CREW} upgrade icon.

fields.name: Stygium Particle Accelerator
fields.text: When you either decloak or perform a cloak action, you may perform a free evade action.

fields.name: Countermeasures
fields.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may discard this card to increase your agility value by 1 until the end of the round.  Then you may remove 1 enemy target lock from your ship.

fields.name: Experimental Interface
fields.text: Once per round, after you perform an action, you may perform 1 free action from an equipped Upgrade card with the "{STRONG}Action:{/STRONG}" header.  Then receive 1 stress token.

fields.name: Tactical Jammer
fields.text: Your ship can obstruct enemy attacks.

fields.name: Advanced SLAM
fields.text: After performing a SLAM action, if you did not overlap an obstacle or another ship, you may perform a free action.

fields.name: Autothrusters
fields.text: When defending, if you are beyond Range 2 or outside the attacker's firing arc, you may change 1 of your blank results to a {EVADE} result. You can equip this card only if you have the {BOOST} action icon.

fields.name: Slave I
fields.text: Your upgrade bar gains the {TORPEDO} upgrade icon.

fields.name: Twin Ion Engine Mk. II
fields.text: You may treat all bank maneuvers ({BANKLEFT} and {BANKRIGHT}) as green maneuvers.

fields.name: Millennium Falcon
fields.text: Your action bar gains the {EVADE} action icon.

fields.name: Moldy Crow
fields.text: During the End phase, do not remove unused focus tokens from your ship.

fields.name: ST-321
fields.text: When acquiring a target lock, you may lock onto any enemy ship in the play area.

fields.name: Royal Guard TIE
fields.text: You may equip up to 2 different Modification upgrades (instead of 1).{BR}You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill value is "4" or lower.

fields.name: A-Wing Test Pilot
fields.text: Your upgrade bar gains 1 {ELITE} upgrade icon.{BR}You cannot equip 2 of the same {ELITE} Upgrade cards.  You cannot equip this if your pilot skill value is "1" or lower.

fields.name: Dauntless
fields.text: After you execute a maneuver that causes you to overlap another ship, you may perform 1 free action.  Then receive 1 stress token.

fields.name: Outrider
fields.text: While you have a {CANNON} Upgrade card equipped, you {STRONG}cannot{/STRONG} perform primary weapon attacks and you may perform {CANNON} secondary weapon attacks against ships outside your firing arc.

fields.name: "Heavy Scyk" Interceptor
fields.text: Your upgrade bar gains the {CANNON}, {TORPEDO}, or {MISSILE} upgrade icon.

fields.name: Virago
fields.text: Your upgrade bar gains the {SYSTEM} and {ILLICIT} upgrade icons.{BR}You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill value is "3" or lower.

fields.name: BTL-A4 Y-Wing
fields.text: You cannot attack ships outside your firing arc. After you perform a primary weapon attack, you may immediately perform an attack with a {TURRET} secondary weapon.

fields.name: IG-2000
fields.text: You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the {EM}IG-2000{/EM} Upgrade card (in addition to your own pilot ability).

fields.name: Andrasta
fields.text: Your upgrade bar gains two additional {BOMB} upgrade icons.

fields.name: TIE/x1
fields.text: Your upgrade bar gains the {SYSTEM} upgrade icon.{BR}If you equip a {SYSTEM} upgrade, its squad point cost is reduced by 4 (to a minimum of 0).

fields.name: Hound's Tooth
fields.text: After you are destroyed, before you are removed from the play area, you may {STRONG}deploy{/STRONG} the {EM}Nashtah Pup{/EM} ship.{BR}It cannot attack this round.

fields.name: Crack Shot
fields.text: When attacking a ship inside your firing arc, you may discard this card to cancel 1 of the defender's {EVADE} results.

fields.name: Maneuvering Fins
fields.text: When you reveal a turn maneuver [{TURNLEFT} or {TURNRIGHT}] you may rotate your dial to the corresponding bank maneuver [{BANKLEFT} or {BANKRIGHT}] of the same speed.

fields.name: Adv. Homing Missiles
fields.text: {STRONG}Attack (Target Lock):{/STRONG} Discard this card to perform this attack.{BR}If this attack hits, deal 1 faceup damage card to the defender. Then cancel {STRONG}all{/STRONG} dice results.
